lead_paragraph: The Athletics and the Rangers played in throwback uniforms last Sunday, and baseball purists (at least those who obsess about fashion) rejoiced. The celebration was not caused by the Oakland players wearing vests or even their butter-cream-yellow batting helmets. Rather, it was the classic stirrup socks.
